Description:
What if your AI agents could remember, learn and collaborate at lightning speed? Discover how Azure Managed Redis, Mem0, and Agent Framework turn stateless agents into intelligent systems. Redis enables real-time collaboration, long-term learning, and semantic routing. Mem0 adds persistent memory across sessions, while Agent Framework powers reasoning and planning. Together, they build smarter, scalable multi-agent systems ready for any domain.

Chapters: 0:00 - Session Introduction and Speaker Welcome 00:01:15 - Azure Managed Redis Overview and Retirement of Previous SKUs 00:11:25 - Demo: Comparing cache misses and hits using Azure Managed Redis 00:14:04 - Transition to customized knowledge and introduction of Shruti 00:15:15 - Overview of agent capabilities and importance of prebuilt action-oriented tools 00:19:00 - Configuring Redis MCP Server and updating travel assistant prompt 00:25:24 - Showcasing long-term memory with user preferences in travel agent scenario 00:27:10 - Overview of multiple tool calls generating responses 00:28:13 - Demonstration of updating user preferences and storing them in Redis
Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Smarter AI Agents with Azure Managed Redis | BRK129
